info.title: Supplier Invoice
info.description: This service enables you to create supplier invoices through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud. Furthermore the service enables you to read, release, reverse and post existing supplier invoices from the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. The service is based on the OData protocol.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, release, reverse, delete or post supplier invoices using this inbound service

values.text: [Service and Material Procurement - Project-Based Services(J13)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/J13 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Accounting: Coding Block (FINS_CODING_BLOCK)
* Procurement: Supplier Invoice (MM_SI_HEADER)
* Procurement: Supplier Invoice Item with Purchasing Document Ref. / Consignment (MM_SI_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads withholding tax data of supplier invoice.
get.description: Reads the withholding tax data of the supplier invoice using, for example, the supplier invoice, the fiscal year, and the document currency.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Document Number of an Invoice Document

parameters.description: Indicator for Withholding Tax Type

post.description: Creates a supplier invoice using, for example, the company code, the invoice gross amount, and the invoicing party. The service supports a deep create of an invoice. In addition, you can park or hold an invoice with header data only.

parameters.description: Document Number of an Invoice Document

post.summary: Reverses a supplier invoice and returns the reversal number.
post.description: Reverses a supplier invoice and creates a reversal document. The system returns the reversal number.

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Time Stamp  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: ReversalReason
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: FiscalYear
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: SupplierInvoice
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_SuplrInvcHeaderWhldgTax HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

top.name: $top

skip.name: $skip
